contentrichtext.text: The '''Ebola River''' in northern [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]] is the [[headstream]] of the [[Mongala River]], a tributary of the [[Congo River]]. [[Ebola virus]] (EBOV) and the taxonomic ranks associated with it and its relatives (genus ''[[Ebolavirus]]'', and species ''[[Bundibugyo ebolavirus]]'', ''[[Reston ebolavirus]]'', ''[[Sudan ebolavirus]]'', ''[[Taï Forest ebolavirus]]'', and ''[[Zaire ebolavirus]]'') are named after this river. == See also == * [[Yambuku]] * [[Epidemiology]] {{Rivers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo}} {{coord|3|19|24|N|20|57|38|E|display=title|region:CD_type:landmark_source:ruwiki}} [[Category:Rivers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo]] {{DRCongo-geo-stub}}
